Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.title: What is the primary cause of facial paralysis in unilateral PFP?
question.description: A question about the underlying cause of facial paralysis in unilateral PFP

option_a.title: Infection of the facial nerve
option_a.description: A plausible but incorrect option that could be considered by someone who is not familiar with the topic

option_b.title: Trauma to the facial nerve
option_b.description: Another plausible but incorrect option that could be considered by someone who is not familiar with the topic

option_c.title: Viral infection of the facial nerve
option_c.description: A correct option that is plausible but may not be the first choice for someone who is not familiar with the topic

option_d.title: Idiopathic
option_d.description: A correct option that is the most likely cause of facial paralysis in unilateral PFP

correct_option.title: d
correct_option.description: The correct letter of the correct option
